```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(linreg.package)
```

Demo `linreg`:
```{r}
#import test data
data("swiss")
dat = swiss

#plug in formula and dataset
linreg(formula = Fertility ~ Education, data = dat)

#formula that selects remaining columns as predictor variables
linreg(formula = Fertility ~ ., data = dat)
```

Comparison of `linreg to lm`:
```{r}
#using same example as above
linreg(formula = Fertility ~ Education, data = dat)

#compare to lm() function
lm(formula = Fertility ~ Education, data = dat)
```
